main event: A series of UFO sightings were reported by multiple witnesses near Donnybrook, North Dakota, on August 6, 1966, involving bright hovering objects and circular imprints in the ground.
interesting points: Several witnesses independently reported seeing bright, glowing lights in the sky, with descriptions varying from circular to disc-shaped., One witness observed a bright object hovering 20 feet above the ground and then rising vertically., Another witness reported seeing a bright disc-shaped object that accelerated rapidly after hovering for several minutes., Investigations revealed no corroborating witnesses and no physical evidence to substantiate the sightings., The case was ultimately classified as 'Unidentified' with no further investigation planned.
sighted object: bright disc-shaped and circular objects in the sky
witness description: local residents, including Mr. John Smith, Mrs. Anna Wilks, and Mr. I.X. Dolittle
